official_title: Teaching Improved Communication To Adolescents and Clinicians
inclusion_criteria:
* All English-speaking adolescent patients
* cognitively able to participate
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 12 Years
Must have maximum age of 21 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Adolescents less than 12 years of age
* Adolescents over 21 years of age
* cognitively unable to participate.
